name: Attack
description: A basic physical attack

name: Fireball
description: A blazing ball of fire that scorches the target

name: Ice Spike
description: A sharp crystalline spike that pierces armor

name: Thunderstorm
description: Lightning strikes all enemies on the battlefield

name: Poison Cloud
description: A toxic mist that damages all enemies over time

name: Double Slash
description: Two swift consecutive strikes with increased precision

name: Earthquake
description: Ground tremors shake and damage all foes

name: Shield Bash
description: A stunning blow that reduces enemy accuracy

name: Wind Blade
description: Razor-sharp wind cuts through multiple enemies

name: Life Drain
description: Absorbs enemy life force to heal yourself

name: Meteor
description: A devastating celestial rock crashes down on all enemies

name: Water Cannon
description: High-pressure water blast with knockback

name: Shadow Strike
description: Strike from the darkness with increased critical chance

name: Holy Light
description: Divine energy that purifies and damages dark enemies

name: Venom Blade
description: Poisoned weapon that deals damage over time

name: Arcane Missile
description: Multiple homing magical projectiles

name: Thunder Clap
description: Stunning electrical burst affecting all nearby enemies

name: Quick Shot
description: Rapid projectile with high accuracy

name: Blizzard
description: Freezing storm that slows and damages all foes

name: Flame Burst
description: Explosive fire damage in a wide area

name: Gale Force
description: Powerful winds that push back and damage enemies

name: Lava Whip
description: Molten whip that burns through enemy defenses

name: Crystal Barrage
description: Multiple crystal shards rain down on all targets

name: Crushing Blow
description: Devastating melee attack that ignores some armor

name: Solar Beam
description: Concentrated sunlight burns through a single target

name: Toxic Spray
description: Venomous attack that weakens enemy defenses

name: Chain Lightning
description: Electricity jumps between all enemies

name: Frost Nova
description: Ice explosion that freezes all nearby enemies

name: Blood Strike
description: Vampiric attack that heals the user

name: Divine Wrath
description: Ultimate holy attack with massive damage

name: Dark Vortex
description: Void energy consumes all enemies on the field
